ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it just me - or are some of the things NPCs allowed to do that we can t just really out of wack? Seemingly endless manna Seemingly limitless casting range
ygData.messageBody:
Is it just me - or are some of the things NPCs allowed to do that we can't
just really out of wack?

Seemingly endless manna
Seemingly limitless casting range
Able to affect folks WELL outside normal range limits
Able to have multiple pets

Lets see - anything I've forgotten?





>Her friend the Negotiator charmed me at L38 with my magic
>resist at 190. Don't underestimate these guys. (She charmed
>both bards in my party of 6. Fortunately, all we did was
>punch our party members for 1-8 damage, while they hacked her
>to pieces.)
